title: minecraft:peek
description: Defines the entity's 'peek' behavior, defining the events that should be called during it

on_close.description: Event to call when the entity is done peeking

event.description: String identifier of the event to call

on_open.description: Event to call when the entity is done peeking

event.description: String identifier of the event to call

on_target_open.description: Event to call when the entity is done peeking

event.description: String identifier of the event to call
